title: over lapping Croud controls
body: Bioware/EA lost Millions or $$$  cause of the trash CC in PVP over lapping CC and there so called RESOLVE system that is spose to make u immune to CC  but oh well this is League and there is far to much CC in this game that overlaps one another which is seriously frustrating to any person!  not to mention other factors that u get hit bye a CC that u were not even in contact with!  if my champ doesnt appear to get hit why does it ! IE>{{champion:103}} charm code is wider then the graphics seem unfair!

replies.body: servers are a bigger issue im still waiting for demigod rerelease make sure its timely
